code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import useFetch from"../../hooks/useFetch";import BlogList from"../BlogList/BlogList";const Home=()=>{const{datas:blogs,setDatas:setBlogs,isPending,error}=useFetch("http://localhost:3001/blogs?_order=desc");const removeBlog=id=>{setBlogs(blogs.filter(blog=>blog.id!==id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home",children:[isPending&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."}),blogs&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BlogList,{blogs:blogs,title:"All blogs!",removeBlog:removeBlog}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"red",fontSize:"1.5rem"},children:error})]});};export default Home;
